com.zebra.sdk.common.card.printer

Class ZebraCardPrinterFactory

  • Object
    • com.zebra.sdk.common.card.printer.ZebraCardPrinterFactory

  • public class ZebraCardPrinterFactory
extends Object
    Creates a card printer object (ZMotif or ZXP).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ZebraPrinterZmotif createZmotifPrinter(ZebraCardPrinter printer)
      Create a wrapper around a Zebra printer that provides access to ZebraPrinterZmotif object from ZebraCardPrinter.
      static ZebraPrinterZxp createZxpPrinter(ZebraCardPrinter printer)
      Create a wrapper around a Zebra printer that provides access to ZebraPrinterZxp object from ZebraCardPrinter.
      static ZebraCardPrinter getInstance(Connection connection)
      Factory method to create the correct ZebraCardPrinter concrete class based on the printer's type.
      static ZebraPrinterZmotif getZmotifPrinter(Connection connection)
      Create a wrapper around a Zebra printer that provides access to ZebraPrinterZmotif object from Connection.
      static ZebraPrinterZxp getZxpPrinter(Connection connection)
      Create a wrapper around a Zebra printer that provides access to ZebraPrinterZxp object from Connection.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ZebraCardPrinter getInstance(Connection connection)
                                    throws ConnectionException
        Factory method to create the correct ZebraCardPrinter concrete class based on the printer's type.
        Parameters:
        connection - an open connection to a printer.
        Returns:
        an instance of a ZebraPrinterZxp.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if an I/O error occurs.
